Docs.param: A GUID representing the user profile application where the social data security trimmer is used.
Docs.summary: Retrieves the registered security trimmer identifiers, and the properties associated with each security trimmer, for the specified user profile application.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string[] GetUrlFoldersRequiringTrim (Microsoft.SharePoint.SPServiceContext serviceContext);

Docs.summary: Gets the URLs associated with the security trimming heuristics.
Docs.returns: The URLs associated with the security trimming heuristics.

remarks.para: The social data whose URL values are hierarchical descendants of the value in the URL column of the results set must pass the security trimming heuristics before being included in any results set returned to a user.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string[] GetUrlFoldersToAlwaysAllow (Microsoft.SharePoint.SPServiceContext serviceContext);
.method public static hidebysig string[] GetUrlFoldersToAlwaysAllow(class Microsoft.SharePoint.SPServiceContext serviceContext) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetUrlFoldersToAlwaysAllow (serviceContext As SPServiceContext) As String()
public: static cli::array <System::String ^> ^ GetUrlFoldersToAlwaysAllow(Microsoft::SharePoint::SPServiceContext ^ serviceContext);

Docs.summary: Gets the URLs that are always included in the results set returned to a user.
Docs.returns: The URLs that are always included in the results set returned to a user.

remarks.para: The social data whose URL values are hierarchical descendants of the value in the URL column of the results set do not need to pass the security trimming heuristics before being included in any results set returned to a user.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void RegisterPluggableSecurityTrimmer (Guid userProfileApplicationProxyId, int id, string fullyQualifiedTypeName, System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection properties);

.method public static hidebysig void RegisterPluggableSecurityTrimmer(valuetype System.Guid userProfileApplicationProxyId, int32 id, string fullyQualifiedTypeName, class System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection properties) cil managed
Public Shared Sub RegisterPluggableSecurityTrimmer (userProfileApplicationProxyId As Guid, id As Integer, fullyQualifiedTypeName As String, properties As NameValueCollection)

public: static void RegisterPluggableSecurityTrimmer(Guid userProfileApplicationProxyId, int id, System::String ^ fullyQualifiedTypeName, System::Collections::Specialized::NameValueCollection ^ properties);

Docs.param: A GUID representing the user profile application where the social data security trimmer will be used.

The security trimmer identifier (ID). This value is unique; if a security trimmer is registered with an ID that is already registered for another security trimmer, the registration for the first trimmer is overwritten with the registration for the second trimmer.
The strong name of the custom security trimmer assembly.
Optional. The name/value pairs that specify the configuration properties.
Docs.summary: Registers a pluggable security trimmer and saves it to the search service application.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void SetTrimmerSettings (Microsoft.SharePoint.SPServiceContext serviceContext, bool enableTrimming);
.method public static hidebysig void SetTrimmerSettings(class Microsoft.SharePoint.SPServiceContext serviceContext, bool enableTrimming) cil managed
Public Shared Sub SetTrimmerSettings (serviceContext As SPServiceContext, enableTrimming As Boolean)
public: static void SetTrimmerSettings(Microsoft::SharePoint::SPServiceContext ^ serviceContext, bool enableTrimming);

Docs.param: true to enable the security trimming heuristics for all social data; otherwise, false.

remarks.para: The parameter specifies whether the security trimming heuristics are enabled. If the value is true, the security trimming heuristics must be enabled for all social data. If the value is false, the security trimming heuristics must be disabled for all social data.

Docs.param: The URLs associated with the security trimming heuristics.
The URLs that are always included in the results set returned to a user.
Docs.summary: Updates the trimmer setting based on the URLs associated with the security trimming heuristics and the URLs that are always included in the results set returned to a user.

remarks.para: This method sets the trimmer setting.
